PyDataSource.AddOn¶

class PyDataSource.AddOn(ds, alias)[source]¶

Collection of methods to add parameters, properties, and reduction/proccesing of data with roi, projection, histogram methods.

__init__(ds, alias)[source]¶

x.__init__(…) initializes x; see help(type(x)) for signature

Methods

__init__(ds, alias) x.__init__(…) initializes x; see help(type(x)) for signature
count([attr, gain, unit, doc, roi, name, limits]) Count (i.e., sum) of detector within optional roi.
histogram([attr, bins, gain, unit, doc, …]) Make a histogram.
module([module]) Add detector module
parameter(**kwargs) Add parameters as keword arguments.
peak([attr, ichannel, name, xaxis, roi, …]) Simple 1D peak locator.
projection([attr, axis, roi, sensor, name, …]) Make a projection along an axis.
property(func_name[, attr]) Add a property that operates on this detector object.
psplot(*attrs, **kwargs) Add psplot.
roi([attr, sensor, roi, name, xaxis, yaxis, …]) Make roi for given attribute, by default this is given the name img.
